# Project Instructions

## Project Overview
DSA Runtime Analysis System - Full Stack Application
- Backend: Node.js + Express (Port 9092)
- Frontend: Next.js 14 + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS

## Current Status
- âœ… Backend API complete with Docker support
- ðŸ”„ Creating Next.js frontend

## Development Guidelines
- Keep UI minimal and clean
- Use Tailwind CSS for styling
- Integrate with backend at http://localhost:9092/api/submit
- Support Java, C++, Python code execution
- Display runtime graphs using Chart.js
